description: This header file declares functions and types for managing automation actions within the zilker-sdk. It includes initialization, cleanup, registration of operation handlers, and posting actions in JSON format, serving as an interface for automation-related event handling.

methods.name: automationActionInit
methods.description: Initializes the automation action handling subsystem.

methods.name: automationActionDestroy
methods.description: Cleans up and terminates the automation action handlers.

methods.name: automationActionRegisterOps
methods.description: Registers a handler callback for a specific action name.

methods.name: automationActionPost
methods.description: Posts a new action message in JSON format to be handled asynchronously.
